Action comedy, starring Faizon Love, Kirk Fox and Tony Todd.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: A look at all the films coming to Sky Cinema in February.(n)

programme.title: Doom: Annihilation
programme.desc: A group of Marines respond to a distress call from a top secret scientific base on the Martian moon Phobos, only to discover it's been overrun by demons who threaten to create Hell on Earth. Fantasy adventure based on the hit video game, starring Amy Manson, Dominic Mafham, Luke Allen-Gale.(n)

programme.title: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: A by-the-book police officer serving in the Marine Corps Reserves is driven to take drastic measures when his brother is arrested after a bar fight and given an unfair prison sentence. Action thriller, starring Jai Courtney, Nat Wolff and Leighton Meester.(n)

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A storm-chaser and her estranged husband are brought together in a joint project to monitor the path of an oncoming tornado - but the pair face a race against the clock as a rival government-backed group with hi-tech resources tries to beat them to it. Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless outcast Deckard Shaw must put their differences aside and team up when a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist gains control of an insidious bio-threat that could alter humanity forever. Action adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator in the ancient Roman city falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy merchant, who is being forced into marriage with a corrupt senator. When the nearby volcano Vesuvius erupts, he fights to save her and escape the destruction of the city. Disaster movie, starring Kit Harington, Emily Browning, Carrie-Anne Moss and Kiefer Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Jarhead: Law of Return
programme.desc: When an accomplished fighter pilot and son of a US senator is shot down and taken captive in Syria, a squad of elite soldiers risk it all on a dangerous mission to save an ally they've never met. War drama, starring Yael Eitan, Nicholas Aaron and Shanti Ashanti.(n)
